name: magic-button
description: Chrome Extension MV3 + GCP Vertex AI - Assistant IA intelligent

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:extension
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:extension
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:extension
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:extension
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:extension
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules extension/node_modules backend/dist extension/dist

author: Yassine
